summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于扩展 SharePoint 项目验证过程的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that you can use to extend the validation process for SharePoint projects.

summary.span: 有关使用此命名空间中的类型详细信息，请参阅[扩展 SharePoint 包和部署](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-packaging-and-deployment)以及[如何：为 SharePoint 解决方案创建自定义功能和包验证规则](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions)。

span.span: For more information about using the types in this namespace, see [Extending SharePoint Packaging and Deployment](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-packaging-and-deployment) and [How to: Create Custom Feature and Package Validation Rules for SharePoint Solutions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-custom-feature-and-package-validation-rules-for-sharepoint-solutions).
